title: Sanctuary of the People and Graces
description: An open air sanctuary in Athens, dedicated to the People (Demos) of Athens and the Graces (Charites), located between the Dipylon Gate and the Agora. Archaeological remains were partially destroyed during construction of the Athens-Piraeus railway
names: Sanctuary of the People and Graces
tò témenos toû Dḗmou kaì tōn Charítōn
Sanctuary of Demos and the Charites

properties.title: ToposText Location: Demos and Graces shrine
